name: deterioration
description:
deterioration is an interactive narrative game, which follows three siblings struggling to accept each other and their decisions in a world where physical decay begins long before death. The choices that the player makes in each character's shoes will ultimately affect the story's ending. 

deterioration has:

  • 9,339 words

  • 180 passages

  • 268 links

  • 5 main variables

  • 12 endings

The characters in this game also feature in a 12 page comic, orange bottles, which takes place after the events of this game. Both are part of the same overall project; however, the game and the comic can stand independently of one another.

deterioration was a participant in the Sammy Showcase 2017 as an undergraduate game.

Made in 2017.
